content: No, …Ivanka? Putin told trump what and where and when. Ivanka may have helped her father pivot on a dime, and came up with the “beautiful baby” idea. Trump gave the order and coordinates Putin gave him to the navy as Putin demanded, and trump watched from a Florida Banquet room. The keystone kop administration could not have pulled this off. If trump did not do as he was told, the russians would have chucked him out his trump tower penthouse window.
